description.narrative: By 2025, more children in schools and people visiting health facilities have access to safely managed WASH services, which contributes to Sanitation, Sanitation (Covid), Water, Water (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2025, more children and their families, particularly in rural and poor urban areas and in humanitarian situations, use affordable, sustainable and safely managed water and sanitation services, practice safe hygiene behaviours.
